name: WoW Bubble - Pop Bubble Crush，Puzzle Marble
name_original: WoW Bubble - Pop Bubble Crush，Puzzle Marble
description:
An extremely well-designed and attractive " Wow Bobble"game.
massive levels make you can hardly tear yourself away from it.

This game changes the fixed playing strategy,just make a journey of adventure in the sky,experience the challenges of various modes of game.

Innovative design,as many as dozens of skills and props, various combinations allow you to show your capabilities in this journey.

Character advances,tasks and challenges,get gold coins,lucky turntable,all of them are waiting for you.


Real physical collision,gorgeous animation,wonderful game music,better gaming experience.

Now,join the " Wow Bobble" adventure with us!

Features

*experience the challenges of various modes of game.
1.Classic Mode
2.Racing Mode
3.Rotate Mode
4.Rescue mode
5.boss mode

*Innovative design,as many as dozens of skills

*improve yourself

*1000 stages

* a mountain of props

*Real physical collision

*gorgeous animation

*wonderful game music
